title: Orange liqueur blueberry tart
ingredients: ['1 (23cm) shop-bought pastry case, baked', '150g caster sugar', '2 1/2 tablespoons cornflour', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '160ml water', '145g fresh blueberries', '30g butter', '1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 1/2 tablespoons orange liqueur', '290g fresh blueberries', '475ml whipped cream for garnish']
